org.assertj.core.api

Class StringAssert

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.assertj.core.api.AbstractAssert<S,A>
      • org.assertj.core.api.AbstractCharSequenceAssert<StringAssert,String>
        • org.assertj.core.api.StringAssert
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Assert<StringAssert,String>, Descriptable<StringAssert>, EnumerableAssert<StringAssert,Character>, ExtensionPoints<StringAssert,String>

    public class StringAssert
extends AbstractCharSequenceAssert<StringAssert,String>
    Assertion methods for Strings.

    To create a new instance of this class, invoke Assertions.assertThat(String).

    This class has been defined so that, when calling AbstractCharSequenceAssert.usingComparator(java.util.Comparator), one provide a String comparator instead of a CharSequence comparator.
    Author:
    Mikhail Mazursky
